message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to own a product that has the potential to change your life! With its unique features and cutting-edge technology, I'm confident that you'll love it. And at just $1000000, it's a steal! I'm willing to let it go for this price because I'm looking to clear out some inventory and make room for new products. What do you say? Will you take this amazing deal?

I'm not sure about the product's quality, and I'm not willing to take the risk of buying it without knowing its quality first. Can you give me more information or a chance to inspect it before I make a decision?

I completely understand your concerns, Bob! I'm happy to offer you a special preview of the product's features and benefits. In fact, I'll even give you a 5-minute demo of its capabilities. This will give you a better understanding of what you're getting for your investment. And, I'll sweeten the deal by throwing in a 1-year warranty, which is unheard of in the industry. So, what do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge and experience the product for yourself?

Thank you for the demo and the warranty offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision. Can I have a chance to inspect more products before committing to a purchase?

I understand your hesitation, Bob, and I respect your desire to do your due diligence. However, I have to let you know that I'm only offering this product at this price for a limited time, and I'm not sure how long it will last. I'm willing to make an exception for you, though, and offer you a special 'product pass' that will allow you to inspect not one, not two, but three more products before making a decision. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, it's gone for good. What do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible opportunity?

Thank you for the offer, but I'm not interested in buying the current product. I'd like to take you up on the 'product pass' offer and inspect three more products before making a decision. I'm looking forward to seeing what you have to offer.

Fantastic decision, Bob! I'm glad you're excited about the 'product pass' offer. And now, I'm thrilled to present to you our next product, which is truly exceptional. This one has received rave reviews from our top customers and has been praised for its unparalleled performance. I'm confident that you'll be blown away by its features and capabilities. And, as a special treat, I'll give you an exclusive deal: if you buy this product now, I'll throw in a complimentary upgrade package worth $200000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it available to you because of our special relationship. What do you say? Are you ready to experience the best of the best?

Thank you for the offer, but I'm not convinced yet. I'd like to inspect more products before making a decision. The 'product pass' offer was a great incentive, but I'm not willing to buy this product without seeing more options. Can I see another product, please?
